### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and small-electric-pole(position x=7.5, y=-0.5) and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### Lab
Consists of Lab(position x not specified) with lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 50} and status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### Pipe groups
Consists of following pipe groups
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35776, position=x=-0.5 y=-2.5) 
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35785, position=x=5.5 y=7.5) 
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35791, position=x=-0.5 y=13.5) 
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35803, position=x=-5.5 y=23.5) 
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35806, position=x=-6.5 y=24.5) 
- PipeGroup(fluid_system=35808, position=x=-5.5 y=25.5) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting connection
- Make sure that the entities are compatible for connection

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the target location is not occupied by another entity or water before attempting to place a pipe
- Check the terrain to ensure it is placeable before attempting to place a pipe

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network and has input liquid before attempting to use it
- Check the warnings and status of the steam engine to identify any issues

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump has fluid present in connections before attempting to use it
- Check the warnings and status of the offshore pump to identify any issues

### Errors when using lab
- Ensure that the lab has power before attempting to use it
- Check the lab input and status to identify any issues
